thread.section_title: Impericon Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Impericon | www.impericon.com | 3 von 132
thread.title: Ollieparton OP

author: Ollieparton OP
title: Ollieparton OP
text: My order was more than 24h before it was shipped. I however have been a customer of Impericon for 6 years now and they have never disappointed in quality nor delivery. Even though the order was more than 24h to be shipped I don't care because they service is exceptional and their customer support is immense! Always a 10/10 rating from this customer!
